thread.title: ‘Giant’ creature was lost to science for 126 years. It’s just been found in Madagascar | World | leadertelegram.com
thread.title_full: ‘Giant’ creature was lost to science for 126 years. It’s just been found in Madagascar | World | leadertelegram.com

author: Irene Wright - The Charlotte Observer (TNS)
title: ‘Giant’ creature was lost to science for 126 years. It’s just been found in Madagascar | World | leadertelegram.com
text: When a new species is discovered in the depths of the rainforest or on top of a mountain, it can be years before the creature is cataloged again. Separated from science by elevation, water or tangled branches, the species lives undisturbed, its populations existing in an almost-separate world. kAm$@>6E:>6D[ D@ >F49 E:>6 A2DD6D[ D4:6?E:DED 42?’E 36 DFC6 H96E96C E96 2?:>2=D DE:== 6I:DE] %92E’D H96?
